name: Fahad Faisal

top_projects.name: simple-web-cache-poision-scanner
top_projects.description: A simple cache poision sannner for finding x-forwaded-Sheme issues

BugAnnihilator/hedera-sdk-js.summary: Recent activities include updating the util.js file to address an issue where the convertToNumber function improperly allowed strings as valid input, potentially leading to unexpected behavior. This was resolved through a series of push events, improving the overall stability and security of the repository.

hashgraph/hedera-sdk-js.summary: A significant pull request event was logged, detailing a vulnerability in the convertToNumber function within the util.js file. This function was found to improperly allow strings as valid input, which could lead to unexpected behavior or errors. The pull request provided a clear description of the issue, example impact, and a recommendation for a fix, highlighting the importance of input validation for maintaining the integrity and reliability of the SDK.

APTRS/APTRS.summary: A pull request was submitted to update the main.js file, aiming to resolve an issue tracked as https://github.com/APTRS/APTRS/issues/32. This update is expected to fix a specific problem, contributing to the overall health and functionality of the repository.

profile_summary:
Fahad Faisal is a highly skilled and accomplished developer with a strong expertise in programming languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. As a seasoned bug bounty hunter and CTO of Cyboteck, he has consistently demonstrated his ability to identify and resolve complex technical issues, leveraging his expertise to drive innovation and growth. With a professional network of followers and a substantial portfolio of 22 public repositories, Fahad has established himself as a reliable and prolific developer, dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet the evolving needs of the industry.

As a technical leader, Fahad brings a unique blend of technical expertise and business acumen to the table, with a proven track record of driving projects forward and delivering results. His proficiency in languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python enables him to tackle a wide range of development challenges, from front-end and back-end development to data analysis and machine learning. With his strong professional network and influence, Fahad is well-positioned to collaborate with other developers, share knowledge, and stay at the forefront of industry trends, making him a valuable asset to any organization seeking to drive technical excellence and innovation.
